name: enevate BV
goal:
Enevate BV develops the next generation of wind energy systems in the field of Airborne Wind Energy.

Airborne Wind Energy allows to access winds in higher altitudes while using significantly less material than conventional solutions currently available. This opens up new geographical markets for wind energy to contribute to the global energy mix.
interests: Climate Action, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Enlargement, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Humanitarian Aid, Regional Policy, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Enevate BV is currently following the process regarding EU Innovation Fund. While the Innovation Fund can in principle finance Airborne Wind Energy (AWE) projects already according to the current draft plans, since “Next generation wind turbines” are included as eligible technology, we would like to try to bring more emphasis on AWE as a key breakthrough renewable energy technology.
